nodes.text: Imperius Unitada ober Totallex, literally translating to "Empire united over all," was a propaganda poster created by Dalraga de Cueravon and Janyor of Bith for the Galactic Empire, sponsored by COMPNOR. It depicted a raised fist and the Imperial crest with the Atrisian Basic motto "Imperius Unitada ober Totallex" written across the front, with a red stripe emitting from the hand and surrounding the Imperial crest. It was created shortly after the drafting of the Imperial Charter.
In Janyor of Bith's autobiocron Dear Anguillon, Janyor described his disgust with himself for the "unflinching fascist image" of the poster.
Imperius Unitada ober Totallex is an in-universe artwork in the Canon artbook Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy. It was illustrated by Russel Walks.
